messages.content: Transalate to German on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
Cazoo St. Leger Festival
Transalate to German on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year. Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else. A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

Erleben Sie Spannung, Prestige und Festival-Feeling bei einem der Besten und am meisten erwarteten Events in Doncaster. Das diesjährige prestigeträchtige Cazoo St. Leger Festival ist eines der wichtigsten britischen Pferderennen des Jahres. Wenn die Läufer und Reiter die Stände betreten, um beim ältesten Classic Flat-Pferderennen der Welt gegeneinander antreten, können Sie nicht nur Zeuge der Geschichte werden, sondern auch ein gesellschaftliches Ereignis und eine unvergleichliche Atmosphäre erleben. Als Höhepunkt im Veranstaltungskalender von Pferderennen strömen die Leute herbei, um all die Dramatik und Show zu erleben, die Sie von einer Veranstaltung dieses Kalibers erwarten würden, und die Straßen von Doncaster sind während des viertägigen Cazoo St. Leger Festivals mit Flaggen und einem Festival-Feeling gesäumt.
Transalate to German on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).

Machen Sie das Beste aus dem St. Leger Festival, indem Sie es mit den einzigartigen Hospitality-Paketen von Doncaster kombinieren. Das Restaurant Triple Crown befindet sich im VIP Bereich Club 1776 in der Mitte des Kurses und bietet das komplette Paket, Ihr Paket beinhaltet Champagner bei der Ankunft, ein 3-Gänge-Gourmet-Mittagessen vom Buffet, feinsten Nachmittagstee und eine Bar mit Bier, Wein, Cider und alkoholfreien Getränken und Spirituosen (Gruppen von weniger als 10 Personen können an einem gemeinsamen Tisch sitzen).
Transalate to German on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.

Anthony Joshua wird am 25. September im Tottenham Stadium seinen Weltmeistertitel im Schwergewicht gegen Oleksandr Usyk verteidigen. Sehen Sie, wie zwei olympische Goldmedaillengewinner an einem unvergesslichen Abend in Londons heißestem Stadion alles aufs Spiel setzen.
Transalate to German on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, acesss to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.

Holen Sie sich VIP Hospitality Tickets für den Kamp Anthony Joshua gegen Aleksander Usyk im Tottenham Stadium. Machen Sie das Beste aus Ihrem Tag mit den besten zentralgelegenen Premium Sitzen, Zugang zu privaten Bars vor und nach dem Spiel sowie Zugang zu privaten Bars die den Kauf von Speisen und Getränken ermöglichen.
Transalate to French on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
Festival Cazoo St Leger
Transalate to French on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year.Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else.A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

Vivez l'excitation, le prestige et les festivités à l'occasion de l'un des événements les plus attendus de Doncaster. Le prestigieux festival Cazoo St Leger est l'un des rendez-vous incontournables de l'année au Royaume-Uni. Soyez témoin de l'Histoire lorsque les chevaux et les cavaliers entrent dans les stalles pour gagner la plus ancienne course hippique Classic Flat au monde, et attendez-vous aussi à vivre un événement mondain avec une atmosphère unique en son genre. C'est un sommet des courses hippiques, et les gens affluent pour vivre la dramaturgie des courses, tandis que les rues de Doncaster sont bordées de drapeaux avec une ambiance festive tout au long des quatre jours du festival Cazoo St Leger.
Transalate to French on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).

Profitez au maximum du festival de St Léger en le combinant avec les forfaits d'hospitalité VIP de Doncaster. Situé dans le chapiteau du Club 1776 au centre de la piste, le restaurant Triple Crown propose un forfait complet incluant champagne à l'arrivée, un déjeuner buffet gastronomique à 3 plats, le thé de l'après-midi et un bar tout compris avec bières, vins, cidres, boissons non alcoolisées et spiritueux (les groupes de moins de 10 personnes peuvent être à une table commune).
Transalate to French on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.

Anthony Joshua défendra ses titres mondiaux des poids lourds contre Alexandre Usyk au Tottenham Hotspur Stadium le 25 septembre. Regardez deux médaillés d'or olympiques tout mettre en jeu lors d'une soirée inoubliable dans le stade incontournable de Londres.
Transalate to French on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, acesss to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.

Obtenez des forfaits d'hospitalité VIP pour Anthony Joshua contre Alexandre Usyk au Tottenham Stadium. Profitez au maximum de votre journée avec les billets premium pour des places centrales, qui comprennent des sièges rembourrés, l'accès à votre bar privé avant et après le match, ainsi que la possibilité d'acheter de la nourriture et des boissons.
Transalate to Chinese on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
Cazoo圣烈治锦标赛
Transalate to Chinese on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year. Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else. A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

在唐卡斯特最出色和最受期待的活动之一，体验所有的兴奋、威望和节日气氛。今年久负盛名的Cazoo圣烈治锦标赛是今年必须参与的英国赛马活动之一。除了见证马匹和骑师进入马厩，参加世界上最古老的经典平地赛马的历史外，还期待体验无与伦比的社交场合和氛围。作为赛马日历上的顶尖活动，人们蜂拥而至，体验这种规模的活动的所有戏剧性划面和表演技巧。在为期四天的Cazoo圣烈治锦标赛期间，唐卡斯特的街道两旁将挂满旗帜，充满节日气氛。
Transalate to Chinese on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).
将圣烈治锦标赛与唐卡斯特的招牌款待套餐相结合，尽享节庆。三冠餐厅位于球场中心的1776俱乐部大帐篷内，提供完整套餐，您的套餐包括抵达时的迎宾香槟、3 道菜美食自助午餐、精致下午茶和包括啤酒、葡萄酒、苹果酒、软饮料和烈酒的全包酒吧(少于10人的团体可能要共用餐桌)。
Transalate to Chinese on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.
安东尼·约书亚将于9月25日在托特纳姆热刺体育场对阵奥列克山德·乌西克，捍卫他的世界重量级冠军头衔。在伦敦最炙手可热的体育场观看两位奥运金牌得主的精彩对决，度过一个难忘的夜晚。
Transalate to Chinese on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, acesss to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.
预订托特纳姆体育场的款待套餐，欣赏安东尼·约书亚和亚历山大·乌西克的对决。利用中央高级座位票，尽享极致观赛体验。套餐包括软垫座位、赛前和赛后使用豪华私人酒吧，以及在私人酒吧购买食物和饮料。
Transalate to Arabic on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
مهرجان كازو سانت ليجر
Transalate to Arabic on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year.Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else.A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

عيش كل الإثارة والحماس والشعور بأجواء المهرجان في واحدة من أفضل الأحداث وأكثرها تميزاً في دونكاستر. يعد مهرجان سازو سانت ليغير المرموق هذا العام أحد أهم سباقات الخيل التي يجب حضورها في المملكة المتحدة لهذا العام ، إلى جانب المشاهد التاريخية عندما يدخل المتسابقون والراكبون إلى المضمار للتنافس في أقدم سباق للخيول الكلاسيكية في العالم ، تجهز لخوض تجربة اجتماعية رائعة وأجواء لا مثيل لها ، حيث التألق في سباق الخيل ، حيث يشارك الجميع في تجربة رائعة وحماسية في هذا العرض التي يتوق منه حدث من هذا العيار ، حيث تزين شوارع دونكاستر بالأعلام ويطفو إحساس المهرجان في جميع أنحاء المكان لمدة أربعة أيام.
Transalate to Arabic on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).

حقق أقصى استفادة من مهرجان سانت ليغير من خلال دمجه مع باقات الضيافة المميزة من دونكاستر. يقع داخل قبة نادي 1776 في وسط مكان الحدث، يقدم مطعم تريبل كرون الباقة الكاملة حيث تشمل على الشمبانيا عند الوصول ، وبوفيه وجبة غداء شهية من 3 أطباق ، وبالاضافة الى تقديم لشاي فترة ما بعد الظهر وبار يقدم البيرة والنبيذ وعصير التفاح والمشروبات الغازية والروحية (يمكن للمشاركين البالغ عددهم أقل من 10 الجلوس على طاولة مشتركة.
Transalate to Arabic on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.

سيدافع أنتوني جوشوا عن ألقابه العالمية في الوزن الثقيل بمواجهة ألكسندر أوسيك في ملعب توتنهام هوتسبير يوم 25 سبتمبر. شاهد اثنين من أصحاب الميداليات الذهبية الأولمبية يضعان كل شيء على المحك خلال أمسية لا تُنسى في أكثر استادات لندن حماسة وبمواجهة تملأها الاثارة.
Transalate to Arabic on the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, acesss to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.

احصل على باقات ضيافة أنتوني جوشوا وألكسندر أوسيك في ملعب توتنهام. استمتع بيومك مع تذاكر المقاعد المركزية المميزة ، والتي تشمل المقاعد المبطنة ، وامكانية الوصول إلى البارات الخاصة الفاخرة قبل وبعد المباراة ، بالإضافة إلى الوصول إلى الحانات الخاصة لشراء وجبات طعام شهية والمشروبات والمتنوعة.
Translate to Russian in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
Фестиваль Cazoo St Leger
Translate to Russian in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year.Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else.A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

Испытайте весь азарт, престиж и атмосферу фестиваля на одном из лучших и самых долгожданных событий в Донкастере. В этом году престижный фестиваль Cazoo St Leger - одно из обязательных для посещения соревнований в Великобритании. Когда бегуны и всадники выходят на трибуны, чтобы соревноваться друг с другом в старейших в мире классических конных скачках на плоской поверхности, вы можете не только стать свидетелем истории, но и окунуться в светское мероприятие в несравненной атмосфере. Это значимые дни в календаре соревнований по скачкам, когда люди стекаются, чтобы испытать всю драму и зрелищность, которую ожидают от мероприятия такого масштаба. А улицы Донкастера будут украшены флагами и будут дарить праздничную атмосферу в течение четырех дней фестиваля Cazoo St Leger.
Translate to Russian in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).

Получите максимум удовольствия от фестиваля Сент-Леджер, сочетая его с фирменными пакетами гостеприимства Донкастер. Ресторан Тройная Корона, расположенный в шатре Club 1776 в центре поля, предлагает полный пакет услуг. В ваш пакет входит шампанское по прибытии, изысканный обед из 3 блюд, лучший послеобеденный чай и полный бар с пивом, вином, сидром и безалкогольными и спиртными напитками (на общем столе могут быть группы до 10 человек).
Translate to Russian in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.

Энтони Джошуа будет защищать свои титулы чемпиона мира в супертяжелом весе против Александра Усика на стадионе Тоттенхэм Хотспур 25 сентября. Посмотрите, как два олимпийских золотых медалиста сражаются за победу и проведите незабываемый вечер на лондонском стадионе, который нельзя не посетить.
Translate to Russian in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, access to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.

Получите VIP-пакеты гостеприимства на матч Энтони Джошуа и Александра Усика на стадионе Тоттенхэм. Получите максимум удовольствия от дня с билетами на центральные места премиум-класса, которые включают в себя мягкие сиденья, доступ в личный бар до и после игры, а также возможность покупки еды и напитков.
Translate to Spanish in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.
Cazoo St Leger Festival
Festival de St Leger de Cazoo
Translate to Spanish in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Experience all the excitement, prestige and festival-feels at one of the best and most highly-anticipated events in Doncaster. This year’s prestigious Cazoo St Leger Festival is one of the must-attend UK horse racing fixtures of the year.Along with witnessing history when the runners and rider enter the stalls to compete in the world’s oldest Classic Flat horse racing fixture, expect to experience a social occasion and atmosphere like nothing else.A pinnacle on the horse racing event calendar, people flock to experience all the drama and showmanship you’d expect from an event of this calibre and Doncaster’s streets are lined with flags and a festival-feel throughout the four-day Cazoo St Leger Festival.

Vive la emoción, el prestigio y la sensación de los festivales en uno de los mejores y más esperados eventos de Doncaster. El prestigioso Festival St Leger Cazoo de este año es uno de los eventos de carreras de caballos más importantes del Reino Unido.Además de presenciar la historia cuando los cabellos y jinetes ingresan a los puestos para competir en el evento de carreras planas más antiguo del mundo, puedes esperar una ocasión social y un ambiente como ningún otro. Un pico en el calendario de eventos de carreras de caballos, la gente acude en masa para vivir todo el drama y el espectáculo que esperarías de un evento de este calibre y las calles de Doncaster seran alineadas con banderas y un ambiente festivo durante los cuatro días del Festival St Leger de Cazoo.
Translate to Spanish in the context of a hospitality ticketing website.

Make the most of the St Leger Festival by combining it with of Doncaster's signature hospitality packages. Situated within the Club 1776 marquee in the centre of the course the Triple Crown restaurant offers the complete package, your package includes Champagne on arrival, 3 course gourmet buffet lunch, finest afternoon tea and fully inclusive bar of beers, wines, ciders, soft drinks and spirits (parties of less than 10 may be on a shared table).

Aproveche al máximo el Festival de St Leger combinándolo con los paquetes de hospitalidad exclusivos de Doncaster. Situado dentro de la carpa del Club 1776 en el centro del campo, el restaurante Triple Crown ofrece el paquete completo, el paquete incluye champán a la llegada, almuerzo buffet gourmet de 3 platos, el mejor té de la tarde y barra libre de cervezas, vinos, sidras, refrescos y licores (grupos de menos de 10 pueden estar en una mesa compartida).

Anthony Joshua will defend his world heavyweight titles against Oleksandr Usyk at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on 25 September. Watch two Olympic Gold medalists put it all on the line during an unforgettable evening in London's hottest stadium.

Anthony Joshua defenderá sus títulos mundiales de peso pesado contra Oleksandr Usyk en el Tottenham Hotspur Stadium el 25 de septiembre. Mira de cerca cómo dos medallistas de oro olímpicos lo ponen todo en juego durante una noche inolvidable en el estadio más emocionante de Londres.

Get hospitality packages for Anthony Joshua and Aleksander Usyk at Tottenham Stadium. Make the most of your day with Central Premium Seating tickets, which include padded seats, acesss to luxury private bars before and after the match, as well as access to private bars to purchase food and drinks.

Obtenga paquetes de hospitalidad para Anthony Joshua y Aleksander Usyk en el Tottenham Stadium. Aprovecha al máximo tu día con las entradas Asientos centrales premium, que incluyen asientos acolchonados, acceso a bares privados de lujo antes y después del partido, así como acceso a bares privados para comprar comida y bebida.
